Package model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    this is a player class which contains the players attributes and basic setter getter functions to get and set the value out of it. Some business logic is also added in this class
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Md Hasibul Huq
